title: AngryBots
description: A Unity demo featuring robot combat in a space station environment. This tech demo showcases Unity's capabilities for creating 3D games that run in the browser. Navigate through a detailed sci-fi environment while battling hostile robots with various weapons.
how_to_play: Use WASD or arrow keys to move, mouse to aim, and left-click to shoot. Move through the space station, eliminating enemy robots and discovering the environment. This demo highlights the graphical and performance capabilities of Unity's WebGL export.
